Header: A UNP Protest Motorcade from Colombo to Mahiyanganaya
Content: A protest motorcade of the United National Party was commenced in Colombo today. It has been named as “Yukthiye Yathrawa”. UNP Parliamentarian Harin Fernando has organized the protest motorcade which will travel to Mahiyanganaya. A group of people including UNP Leader Ranil Wickremasinghe was present on the occasion.
